title: ICSI Invites Suggestions for its Strategic Action Plan (2026-30) – A Call to Action!
content:
# ICSI Invites Suggestions for its Strategic Action Plan (2026-30) – A Call to Action!

Ek important update hai. The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne apna **Strategic Action Plan (2026-30)** ke Exposure Draft par stakeholders se suggestions invite kiye hain.

ICSI ka Council chahta hai ki Company Secretary profession ke future ko shape karne mein sabhi stakeholders actively participate karein.

*   **Announcement Date:** January 2, 2026
*   **What it is:** The Exposure Draft of the ICSI Strategic Action Plan (2026-30) outlines key proposals for the Institute's growth over the next five years.
*   **Key Areas Covered:** The plan includes significant proposals such as transforming ICSI's service delivery through digital automation, revisiting the CS Course structure, curriculum, training, and assessment systems. It also focuses on strengthening the three-tier system (HQ-CCGRT-Region & Chapter Offices), reviewing professional development frameworks, enhancing brand equity and global footprints, and bolstering human resource development and digital infrastructure.
*   **Last Date for Suggestions:** Stakeholders can submit their valuable inputs and suggestions latest by **Thursday, January 8, 2026**.
*   **How to Submit:** Suggestions are to be provided by filling up an online form.
